Author: apexauk
Content: aye.. might be worth going with the notion that chances of different sites existing at www.domain and http://domain (in particular those different sites being used as the identities of two different people) is probably 0.00somethingverysmall.. sure google etc do their funky duplicate content detection but y'know, i reckon you guys could just add a "this aint right" button in the same style as your ones to flag fakes etc, and then just wait for the day anyone actually uses it before worrying what to do about this.

Author: hbien
Content:
My honest feedback, I would buy the Movie Showtimes + Reviews + Tickets because I really like fandango/movietickets.com BUT their mobile interface sucks so it's tough to get tickets ahead of time when I'm out and about. Plus reviews is a bonus.

The Restaurant suggester and contact maker I'd install if they were free, the contact maker seems kinda cool.
